member.name: ID3D10EffectVectorVariable.GetBoolVector
member.summary: Get a four-component vector that contains boolean data.
member.param: A pointer to the first component.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectVectorVariable.GetBoolVectorArray
member.summary: Get an array of four-component vectors that contain boolean data.
member.param: A pointer to the start of the data to set.
Must be set to 0; this is reserved for future use.
The number of array elements to set.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectVectorVariable.GetFloatVector
member.summary: Get a four-component vector that contains floating-point data.
member.param: A pointer to the first component.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectVectorVariable.GetFloatVectorArray
member.summary: Get an array of four-component vectors that contain floating-point data.
member.param: A pointer to the start of the data to set.
Must be set to 0; this is reserved for future use.
The number of array elements to set.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectVectorVariable
member.summary: A vector-variable interface accesses a four-component vector.
